oon hithe thibuna loku balaporoththuwak itu karagaththa .jiwithe thibuna eka eka prashna nisa me de karanna hugak kal giya .mona unath puluwan widihata goda da gaththa .me monawath neweyi .mata mage dayabara birinda lawa githayak karanna wuwamanawak thibuna .onna ekath dan hari .meka podi testin 1 , 2 , 3 ekak wage .hamoma ahala balanna .adu padu penwa denna .eya apita loku udawwak wew idiriyedi karana nirmana walata .(wisheshayen sthuthi karanna ona paththara malli , manosh , mana , asankata,nelum ajith , saha meka yu bateta set karala dunna basu kapal ekata )
